name: Shan'ri
content:
Shan'ri was a female Bothan daughter of Begol Reigel who died during the time of the Galactic Civil War after getting hooked on death sticks.
Dialogue pertaining to Shan'ri appeared in the directory tree files for the 2003 massively multiplayer online roleplaying game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided. However, she is not known to have appeared on the video game's live servers as a proper non-player character.
